Name: trypanosomiasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection caused by parasitic protozoan of the genus Trypanosoma in animals and humans.

Name: obsolete Trypanosoma brucei rhodesiense infectious disease
Definition: A sleeping sickness that involves infection caused by Trypanosoma brucei rhodesiense

Name: obsolete Trypanosoma brucei gambiense infectious disease
Definition: A sleeping sickness that involves infection caused by Trypanosoma brucei gambiense

Name: giardiasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection of the small intestine by a single-celled enteric protozoan parasite Giardia intestinalis. The symptoms include greasy and malodorous stools

Name: malaria
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease characterized as a vector-borne infectious disease caused by the presence of protozoan parasites of the genus Plasmodium in the red blood cells

Name: balantidiasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease involving infection caused by Balantidium coli. The trophozoites are capable of attacking the intestinal epithelium

Name: trichomoniasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that is caused by singled-celled protozoan parasites Trichomonas vaginalis or Trichomonas tenax

Name: coccidiosis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that occurs in the intestinal tract of animals and humans caused by Coccidia protozoa. Immunocompromised persons are at greater risk of developing the infection.

Name: theileriasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection of humans and cattle caused by a genus of parasitic protozoa Theileria

Name: leishmaniasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection caused by protozoan parasite of the genus Leishmania

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's paragranuloma involving intrathoracic lymph nodes
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection caused by protozoan parasite of the genus Leishmania
Synonym: Hodgkin's paragranuloma of intrathoracic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: amebiasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection caused by the amoeba Entamoeba histolytica. Amebic invasion of the intestinal lining causes dysentery

Name: dientamoebiasis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection of the large intestine by a protozoan parasite Dientamoeba fragilis. The symptoms include diarrhea

Name: babesiosis
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that has_symptom mild fevers and has_symptom anemia described as malaria-like symptoms caused by a protozoan of genus Babesia

Name: obsolete obstructed labor
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that has_symptom mild fevers and has_symptom anemia described as malaria-like symptoms caused by a protozoan of genus Babesia
